text: Oothumalai police have arrested a person for allegedly murdering his elder brother. The police said that V. Subramanian (47), a farmhand from Kannadikulam under Oothumalai police station limits hacked to death his elder brother V. Manickam (53), also a farmhand, after the latter allegedly misbehaved with Subramanian’s wife on Wednesday night. Oothumalai police arrested Subramanian.
title: Man murdered
